Class TemplateStage

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.World
      TemplateStage

public abstract class TemplateStage
extends greenfoot.World

This is the abstract level superclass. Sub classes will contain the level designs and this will take the designs and build the levels on a grid. This uses arrays of strings to map out where all the features of the level are.

Version:
3.14159
Author:
Knox and Heller
